title: NaRCLIM climate data
description: A set of 35 bioclimatic variables (20-year average) for NSW, VIC & ACT, calculated according to the WorldClim method
attribution: Evans JP, Ji F, Lee C, Smith P, Argueso D and Fita L (2014) Design of a regional climate modelling projection ensemble experiment Geosci. Model Dev., 7, 621-629
